Module com.marinescu.fxmoney
Package com.marinescu.fxmoney.Interfaces

Interface MyAlertInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddUser, BankerAdmin, ConfirmTransaction, LoanInfo, LoanSummary, Profile, SearchClient
public interface MyAlertInterface
This interface contains custom alert functionalities.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    customAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert alert)
    Customizes the appearance of an alert dialog.
    default void
    showAlert(String type, String message)
    Displays a custom alert with the given type and message.

  • Method Details

    • showAlert

      default void showAlert(String type, String message)
      Displays a custom alert with the given type and message.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of the alert (e.g. "success", "warning").
      message - The message to display in the alert.

    • customAlert

      default void customAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert alert)
      Customizes the appearance of an alert dialog.
      Parameters:
      alert - The alert dialog to customize.
